evidence.source_document: Order Granting Plaintiffs' Application for Temporary Restraining Order
Order Granting Plaintiffs' Application for Temporary Restraining Order
evidence.text: The Court further STAYS this order until noon on June 13, 2025.

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Plaintiffs' Application for Temporary Restraining Order
evidence.text: Defendants are temporarily ENJOINED from deploying members of the California National Guard in Los Angeles. Defendants are DIRECTED to return control of the California National Guard to Governor Newsom. The Court further STAYS this order until noon on June 13, 2025. Plaintiffs are ORDERED to post a nominal bond of $100 within 24 hours. Defendants are further ORDERED TO SHOW CAUSE why a preliminary injunction should not issue. A hearing on this order to show cause will be held on June 20, 2025 at 10 a.m. Order shall be dissolved.

extracted.value: Defendants are temporarily ENJOINED from deploying members of the California National Guard in Los Angeles.
